title: Strategies for Improving EFL Learner Satisfaction Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English grammar and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment construction for science-related vocational English acquisition

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the information quality of an LMS (Learning Management System) in a blended learning environment and achieve over 80% utilization of learning materials.
Learners can complete over 90% of weekly learning objectives through interaction with instructors (teaching presence).
Learners can improve their ability to summarize scientific English papers by over 70% through task performance reflecting cognitive presence elements.
Learners can achieve an average score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in an LMS satisfaction survey based on system quality factors (accessibility, usability).

resources: Science Field English Research Paper Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
